recommendations.title: Expand shaded rest points
recommendations.summary: Set up extra misting tents or shaded lay-bys near markets and transport hubs in General Trias to avoid crowding during heat spikes.

recommendations.title: Intensify hydration alerts
recommendations.summary: Push barangay-level SMS or megaphone reminders every two hours urging residents of General Trias to check vulnerable neighbors and hydrate.

recommendations.title: Deploy barangay patrol thermometers
recommendations.summary: Equip community volunteers with handheld meters to log apparent temperatures around schools and construction corridors in General Trias.
